channel.title: Comments on: Who should you vote for?

item.title: By: Judith
item.dc:creator: Judith
item.description: <p>It'll all be a bit odd for myself & Matt as moving house we'll be voting for people who wont cover the area we'll be moving to, how strange but still worthwhile.</p>
item.content:encoded: It’ll all be a bit odd for myself & Matt as moving house we’ll be voting for people who wont cover the area we’ll be moving to, how strange but still worthwhile.

item.title: By: Fiona
item.dc:creator: Fiona
item.description: <p>Matthew, <br/><br/><br/><br/>great link, nice to know that what my own ill informed views thought was the most appropriate choice for me turns out to be so based on the actual issues as well as my own prejudices!<img src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLY/$FILE/smile.gif"</a>> </p>
item.content:encoded:
Matthew,

great link, nice to know that what my own ill informed views thought was the most appropriate choice for me turns out to be so based on the actual issues as well as my own prejudices!http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLY/$FILE/smile.gif“>
